synopsis.text: Top ping the charts in the realm of alternate universes, VOTOMS Finder presents the journey of Aki Tesuno, a resident of a humble, valley-nestled village. Aki, who spends his days engrossed in fantasies of the idyllic city of Top, works as a guard for scrap scavengers. His life takes an unexpected turn when he is approached by an uptown dweller with a mission: to rescue a high-ranking Topper's abducted daughter. Aki's newfound quest not only brings him closer to his dreams but also sees him take the helm of an impressive robotic mecha, known as an At or Altro. Will Aki's newfound purpose pave the way for a life beyond his wildest dreams? Join him in this thrilling adventure to find out!
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
